imdb.plot outline: Exploring all things Culture, The Culture Cafe is a short, sweet and judge-less show that discusses art, music, food, gaming and much more with a team of professionals and special guests. Adding both art and comedy together, the show was a big success within both Culture Connoisseurs and hobbyists.
imdb.title: The Culture Cafe
plot: Exploring all things Culture, _The Culture Cafe_ (qv) is a short, sweet and judge-less show that discusses art, music, food, gaming and much more with a team of professionals and special guests. Adding both art and comedy together, the show was a big success within both Culture Connoisseurs and hobbyists.::Louisa Calverely
